mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO "QNA_NO", Q.QNA_SUBJECT "QNA_SUBJECT", Q.MEMBER_ID "MEMBER_ID", Q.REG_DATE "REG_DATE", COUNT(A.ANSWER_NO) "QNA_ANSWER_COUNT" FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN QNA_ANSWER A ON Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO GROUP BY Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_SUBJECT, Q.MEMBER_ID, Q.REG_DATE ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into QNA(QNA_NO, QNA_SUBJECT, QNA_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qnaSubject}, #{qnaContent}, #{memberId}, default, default)

SELECT SEQ_QNA_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into QNA_FILE(QNA_FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_RENAME, QNA_NO, WEB_PATH, FILE_ORDER) values (#{qnaNo}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileRename}, #{qnaNo}, #{webPath}, #{fileOrder})

SELECT SEQ_QNAANSWER_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QNA_ANSWER (ANSWER_NO, ANSWER_SUBJECT, ANSWER_CONTENT, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{answerNo}, #{answerSubject}, #{answerContent}, #{qnaNo}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
